name: TruthtoPonder
0:
”Alexa, open truth unashamed”
”Alexa, ask truth unashamed for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start truth unashamed”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: truth unashamed
des: Listen to the latest Episodes and even prior episodes of Truth to Ponder with bob Biermann. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. When listening to our Truth to Ponder podcasts you can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next". At Truth to Ponder we value your privacy and never share any information with third parties.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
